review:
Dr Kamath is Extremely friendly and competent 
My son‚Äôs treatment was supposed to be two years however after one year came to halt after I got transferred from Noida to Mumbai in 2021. Dentist in Mumbai made it look like a big deal and complicated because of which we did not resume it. Unexpectedly we had to move to Bangalore in 6 months and Dr Kamath understood the case history in no time and clearly explained treatment course to complete. It‚Äôs been almost 10 months we are consulting and more than 100% satisfied‚Ä¶ Treatment is expected to end in couple of months and we are extremely satisfied. Highly recommend !
Very professional and fair diagnosis, good clean clinic. Location is very convenient. On time appointment.

review:
Dr Kamath is par excellence in guaging tooth problems correctly,advise the patient on the mode of treatment and executing the work to the patient‚Äôs full satisfaction.He is frank in telling a patient that he is erring against advices.
The doctor is always in a smiling mood and keeps the patient happy.
The doctor‚Äôs charges are very very moderate.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went there for my wisdom teeth paining,.. Without x ray Dr Vikram told it should be removed.. I thought let believe doctor, went to extraction of teeth.. He gave Anastasia, immediately started to Extract, even not waited for 2 min. . It was immense pain I have ever experienced in my life.. I don't recommend this doctor... My legs always shivering whenever I passing by this clinic.
